snippet: An exhibition features the photography of Masashi Kawata, who shot two Mitsubishi i-MiEV electric cars that supported relief efforts after the earthquake and tsunami that struck northern Japan in March 2011.
abstract: An exhibition features the photography of Masashi Kawata, who shot two Mitsubishi i-MiEV electric cars that supported relief efforts after the earthquake and tsunami that struck northern Japan in March 2011.

headline.main: On First Anniversary of Tsunami, Looking Back Through a Canny Lens
